title: Duwii-Gone with the Wind

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make someone gone with the wind, dealing an unstoppable attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players you make gone with the wind will have their abilities in the past erased. For example, if your target gave somebody permanent basic defense, that wouldn't be the case anymore.
- You clean targets you kill.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

desc:
Post 4868
*I have now upgraded from copyright infringement to identity theft!*
